<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instinct Ability](/Feats.aspx?ID=675) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 221 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Barbarian](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=2)

**Prerequisites**
[Barbarian Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=671)

</column>

---

You gain the instinct ability for the [instinct](/classes/barbarian/instincts) you chose for Barbarian Dedication.
name: Instinct Ability
